student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi there! Let's talk about two workplaces. Have you worked in two different places before?
Great! Tell me about the first one. What was it like?
It was a small office. Very friendly people. Quiet environment. I did administrative tasks.
Nice! How about the second workplace? What was it like?
It was a big company. Busy and noisy. I worked in customer service.
Which one did you prefer and why?
I preferred the small office. It was peaceful and less stressful.
Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
